TEXT.TITLE: AMEX ISSUES WARNING ON VENDOR PRICE QUOTES
TEXT.BODY: The American Stock Exchange said market volatility may result in inaccurate price quotations on certain vendor price machines. The Exchange said this volatility has resulted in digits being deleted from certain vendor machines. Reuter
